name: Dark & Moody Macro: The Ultimate Food Photography Prompt Collection
summary: Elevate your digital artistry with a prompt pack specifically engineered for the "Dark & Moody Macro" aesthetic. This collection moves beyond simple food photography, focusing on the raw, tactile details that make a viewer "feel" the image. From the glistening moisture on a sliced fig to the charred, crystalline crust of a ribeye steak, every prompt is a masterclass in Chiaroscuro lighting and extreme close-up detail.
